section.title: Location-Speakers
section.para: Varieties and subdialects of Saho are spoken in Eritrea and Ethiopia (Irob dialect only). The language is very closely related to Afar .

biblioset.title: Notes on the structure of Saho 1, 2

section.title: Attested Archive Paradigms
section.para:
The following tabel lists the shared property=value pairs for each paradigm, and then the variable property=value-list (comma separated). The abbreviation "PNG" in the paradigm variable-value lists stnads for:
gender:f,m,⊤ number:pl,sg person:p1,p2,p3
I.e., the PNG combinations normal with finite tam-forms.Clicking on the paradigmLabel will yield a display of the paradigm in question [either by link to hard-coded term cluster, or canned SPARQL query].
